page.title: 07State and Private Schools
page.content: In the block there are seven schools. Two are private and the other five controlled by Cornwall County Council Education Authority. The{Treliske Preparatory School (private) is an all boys school and part of Truro School, which is governed by the{Methodist Church. There are 132 boys at Treliske with ages ranging from 7-11 years. 45 of them are boarders. The other private school is at{Polwhele}having 200 boys and girls from 4-12 years. Boarders will be accepted in September 1985. There are{4 State Primary Schools}with pupils' ages from 5-11 years. {Shortlanesend School}has 105 pupils, {Tregolls}has 270 pupils and also has a Nursery Unit attached to the School.
